FAQ / Wave 3 / Battle Cards /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Spinner Rims

  1. If Dreadwing - Sky Destroyer has 2 Spinner Rims attached and flips a white trigger on attacking, does he flip 1 extra battle card for each Spinner Rims attached, or just 1 extra? [Source: WotC]
    Both copies of Spinner Rims will trigger and allow you to flip an extra Battle Card, for a total of two, in this scenario.
